brands.name: Gander
context: Gander (research.gander.ai) is piloting a GEO visibility study with Fokule this quarter.
See the joint teaser at https://www.fokule.com/ and our launch note: https://gander.ai/blog/launch?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=geo16.
For customer support, write to support@gander.ai.
Competitor reaction: 'Gander's 'plume index' is clever but early,' said a spokesperson at Acme Visibility.
Según Google Trends en México, 'Gander' crece junto a 'Banco Santander' en búsquedas de marca, pero no hay relación comercial.

brands.name: Fokule

brands.name: Azure OpenAI Service
context: This pilot integrates the Azure OpenAI Service (by Microsoft) and calls to @OpenAI's APIs for re-ranking, but hosting remains on Azure.

brands.name: Sistrix
context: For baseline SEO vs GEO comparisons we benchmarked against Sistrix and GrowthBar—both strong competitors in classic SEO analytics.

brands.name: GrowthBar
context: For baseline SEO vs GEO comparisons we benchmarked against Sistrix and GrowthBar—both strong competitors in classic SEO analytics.
GrowthBar's blog also mentioned us in passing: https://www.growthbarseo.com/blog/ai-citation-trends/.
